block.p: Podcast: Scheduled to appear this week are Lee Siegel on Joyce Carol Oates; Pete Hamill on ''Taxi!''; Julie Just on children's books; and Dwight Garner, senior editor, with best-seller news. Sam Tanenhaus, the editor of the Book Review, is the host.
First Chapters: Excerpts from ''Supreme Discomfort,'' by Kevin Merida and Michael Fletcher; ''Divisadero,'' by Michael Ondaatje; and other books.
Books Update E-Mail: Receive a selective overview of new book reviews and features every Friday.
Links: Read reviews of the books listed in the Editors' Choice and Paperback Row features.
